bioconda.name: seq2hla
bioconda.summary: Precision HLA typing and expression from next-generation RNA sequencing data

biocontainers.name: seq2hla
biocontainers.summary: Seq2hla is a computational tool to determine human leukocyte antigen (hla) directly from existing and future short rna-seq reads. it takes standard rna-seq sequence reads in fastq format as input, uses a bowtie index comprising known hla alleles and outputs the most likely hla class i and class ii types, a p-value for each call, and the expression of each class."

biotools.summary:
seq2HLA is a computational tool to determine Human Leukocyte Antigen (HLA) directly from existing and future short RNA-Seq reads. 
It takes standard RNA-Seq sequence reads in fastq format as input, uses a bowtie index comprising known HLA alleles and outputs the most likely HLA class I and class II types, a p-value for each call, and the expression of each class.

bioschemas.name: Seq2HLA
bioschemas.summary:
seq2HLA is a computational tool to determine Human Leukocyte Antigen (HLA) directly from existing and future short RNA-Seq reads. 
It takes standard RNA-Seq sequence reads in fastq format as input, uses a bowtie index comprising known HLA alleles and outputs the most likely HLA class I and class II types, a p-value for each call, and the expression of each class.

galaxy.summary: Precision HLA typing and expression from RNAseq data
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: seq2HLA is a computational tool to determine Human Leukocyte Antigen (HLA) directly from existing and future short RNA-Seq reads. It takes standard RNA-Seq sequence reads in fastq format as input, uses a bowtie index comprising known HLA alleles and outputs the most likely HLA class I and class II types, a p-value for each call, and the expression of each class.
